input_args.passage: "Serena Williams | Biography, Titles, & Facts | Britannica | What has Serena Williams accomplished? Serena Williams won more Grand Slam singles titles (23) than any other woman or man during the open era in tennis. input_args.claim: 'Comparing these achievements, we can see that Serena Williams has won significantly more titles in both singles and doubles tournaments, as well as more Olympic gold medals.'
